To make bronze the color of azur
Take rock alum and antimony, with twice as much rock alum as antimony, and pound it together in an iron mortar and soak with gum water, then grind it on a marble slab, and then you must use it with a paintbrush, and after letting it dry, you can polish it with wolf tooth or dog tooth.

Take verdigris and soak it in strong vinegar, and soak your bone or horn for an hour, and then apply as needed.
